column4: What is the best partition setting for a normal ubuntu workstation ? Any new guides for that ?
like how much the /usr, /var, /boot and so on should have
How much storage do you have to work with total?
10gb for / the rest for /home  Size differently if you plan on hosting web pages out of /var of course.

For a desktop system, thats all thats really needed.
okay.. and thats a optimal setting ?

Take a 1.5x ram out for swap, or if you have a large amount of ram, do equal to ram.
